Go Back!

JQuery AJAX

JQUERY AJAX GET

This is a simple JQuery AJAX Get call.

Example:

$.ajax({
url:"https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/name/cyprus",
type: "GET",
dataType: 'json'
}).done(function(data){
doSomething(data);
}).fail(function(error){
doSomething(error);
});

Output:

JQUERY GET Call

JQuery using an updated GET CALL.

Example:

$.get('https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/name/france', data => {
doSomething(data);
}).fail( error => {
doSomething(error);
});

Output:

JQUERY GETJSON Call

JQuery using a GETJSON CALL.

Example:

$.getJSON("https://api.funtranslations.com/translate/klingon.json?", {
text: "Hello. My name is Inigo Montoya. You killed my father. Prepare to die."
}).done(data => {
doSomething(data);
}).fail(error => {
doSomething(error);
});

Output:

JQUERY AJAX POST

JQuery AJAX POST CALL.

Example:

let JQPostData = {
email: "bravelittletoaster@cabin.com",
password: "robtheowner"
};
$.ajax({
url: "https://reqres.in/api/register",
type: "POST",
dataType: 'json',
data: JQPostData,
}).done(data => {
doSomething(data);
}).fail(error => {
doSomething(error);
});

Output:

JQUERY POST

JQuery updated AJAX POST CALL.

Example:

let JQPostData2 = {
name: "WinnieThePooh",
loves: "honey"
};
$.post('https://reqres.in/api/users', JQPostData2).done(data => {
doSomething(data);
}).fail( error => {
doSomething(error);
});

Output:
